abstract: The many investment bankers from Citigroup and Goldman Sachs getting pink slips this week will be thrust into a job market already saturated with thousands of unemployed bankers. Where will they go, The Deal wonders?
lead_paragraph: The many investment bankers from Citigroup and Goldman Sachs getting pink slips this week will be thrust into a job market already saturated with thousands of unemployed bankers. Where will they go, The Deal wonders?

headline.main: Will More Bankers Take the Private Equity Plunge?
